name: Praetor
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per praetor level after 1st
equipment: (a) martial weapon and shield or (b) two martial weapons
(a) a light crossbow and 20 bolts or (b) five javelins
(a) a dungeoneerâ€™s pack or (b) a priest's pack
A conduit strand representing the source of your corrupted magic

class_features.name: Cardinal Sin
class_features.description: At 1st level, you choose a Cardinal Sin that grants features at 1st, 3rd, 7th, and 15th level...

class_features.name: Vice & Virtue
class_features.description: At 1st level, your sins take on a physical form of your choosing, granting you vice and virtue effects...

class_features.name: Spellcasting
class_features.description: Starting at 2nd level, you gain the ability to cast 1st level spells and higher...

class_features.name: Corruption
class_features.description: Additionally at 2nd level, your source of magic holds great power and befouled corruption...

class_features.name: Extra Attack
class_features.description: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action...

class_features.name: Martial Incarnum
class_features.description: Starting at 6th level, before you make an attack with a weapon you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll...

class_features.name: Profane Body
class_features.description: At 9th level, you become immune to curses and your hitpoint maximum can no longer be reduced...

class_features.name: Impulse
class_features.description: At 10th level, whenever you miss an attack or fail a saving throw, you may expend a hit dice to add your Wisdom modifier to the roll...

class_features.name: Fell Strike
class_features.description: Beginning at 11th level, you gain advantage on attack rolls against creatures suffering from a condition...

class_features.name: Dark Salvation
class_features.description: Starting at 14th level, you can no longer be knocked unconscious when at 0 hit points...

class_features.name: Final Judgement
class_features.description: At 18th level, choose either Damnation or Absolution, gaining a unique ability based on your choice...

spellcasting.spell_save_dc: 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier
spellcasting.spell_attack_modifier: your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier

features.name: Temptation
features.description: When lust becomes too much to bear, you learn the Mind Sliver cantrip...

features.name: Heartbreaker
features.description: Starting at 3rd level, the sin of lust has intermingled with your magic...

features.name: Paramour
features.description: At 7th level, as a reaction, you can influence a charmed creature's rolls...

features.name: Everlasting Desire
features.description: At 15th level, creatures that resist your enchantment spells must make a second saving throw...

features.name: Craving
features.description: When gluttony becomes too much to bear, you learn the Ravenous Maw cantrip...

features.name: Feast
features.description: At 3rd level, you gain temporary hit points when a creature within 30ft is reduced to 0 hit points...

features.name: Starvation
features.description: At 7th level, you can double the range of necromancy spells or abilities...

features.name: Devour
features.description: At 15th level, you can instantly slay creatures with low hit points using corrupted necromancy...
